originalText.text:
this is a second visit. April 2023. There's two theaters. I went to see Bees and Honey. This theatre is small very intimate. Excellent seats C row seat 9 and 10. This is a surround seating stage. Show was very good.

Modern theater with very comfortable cushion seats. Large stage. Two floors. Very clean bathrooms, hall area and theater. Easy to get to by train and car (difficulty parking use lots in area). Safe area. Staff friendly.

originalText.text: It was a great intimate venue to see a play.  We saw Wolf Play which was amazing, and the staging took over the whole space.  This is the only play I have seen here so I don't know how other set ups would look. They have seats on both sides of the stage which was fun and interesting.

text.text: It was a great intimate venue to see a play.  We saw Wolf Play which was amazing, and the staging took over the whole space.  This is the only play I have seen here so I don't know how other set ups would look. They have seats on both sides of the stage which was fun and interesting.

originalText.text: I brought a group of students to see Wolf Play at MCC and was blown away by the production quality and themes. Dee, the education coordinator, was easy to work with and really helped set us up for success. She sent over an educators guide before the performance to help prep students for what they were going to see and give them a framework for the themes presented. She also helped coordinate logistics, which is not easy for a group of 32 high schoolers! She also facilitated a talk back with some cast members after the show and made sure that the high schoolers voices were heard in the space. We will definitely be returning!

originalText.text: We got a chance to see Nollywood Dreams and it was a wonderful experience! Our first play since the pandemic started, and we couldnâ€™t be more grateful. The staff were diligent about maintaining safety protocols, and theater space was absolutely beautiful. Such an amazing experience for my would be playwright daughter.
